titleInfo.title: 'File 18/78 II (B Series 18/6) King's Regulations under the Bahrain Order in Council'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation system in use runs from the front cover to the back cover and appears written in pencil, enclosed in a circle, in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio. Foliation anomalies: f.1 is followed by ff.1A, 1B.

mods.abstract: The file contains papers dating from 1936 and 1947 only. The file consists of a signed copy of King's Regulations under Article 70 of The Bahrain Order in Council, 1913, Number 2 of 1936: Special Police Officers' Regulations, dated 8 December 1936, with covering letter from the India Office, Whitehall, London, to the Consul General, Consulate-General, Bushire, dated 5 November 1936; and signed notice of King's Regulations under Article 70 (B) of The Bahrain Order in Council, 1913, Number 3 of 1947('Regulation 2 of 1947 - Registration of Transfer of Immovable Property in Bahrain'), dated 2 September 1947, with accompanying certificate of the Librarian and Keeper of the Papers at the Foreign Office dated 26 July 1947.
